description:
The game has been put on hold while accusations of misconduct are discussed. Asuka is given a gift from the Fairies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît qu`une odeur de mort qui apporte la calamité envahit la ville ?
It Seems That the Smell of Death That Brings About Disaster Is Growing Throughout the Town?
Saika o Motarasu Shi no Kaori ga Machi ni Habikoru You Desu yo?
災禍をもたらす死の香りが街にはびこるようですよ?
